description: Review PR #4 code quality. Run typecheck and lint. Fix any issues. Ensure exercise library, streaks, and appointment tracking work correctly.

userStories.title: Run quality checks and fix failures
userStories.description: Run bun run typecheck and bun run lint. Fix any failures. Check for unused imports, dead code, missing types, any build errors.

userStories.title: Review exercise and streak logic
userStories.description: Review streak calculation, daily compliance, scheduling logic. Check for: timezone issues in streak calculation, off-by-one errors, empty state handling, proper date comparisons. Fix anything found.

userStories.title: Review database schema and queries
userStories.description: Review Supabase migrations for exercise_library, appointments tables. Check for: missing indexes, proper foreign keys, RLS policies on new tables, efficient queries. Fix anything found.
